Binary: idzebra-2.0, idzebra-2.0-common, idzebra-2.0-doc, idzebra-2.0-examples, idzebra-2.0-utils, libidzebra-2.0-0t64, libidzebra-2.0-dev, libidzebra-2.0-modules, libidzebra-2.0-mod-alvis, libidzebra-2.0-mod-dom, libidzebra-2.0-mod-grs-marc, libidzebra-2.0-mod-grs-regx, libidzebra-2.0-mod-grs-xml, libidzebra-2.0-mod-safari, libidzebra-2.0-mod-text
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), autoconf, automake, docbook-dsssl, docbook-xml, docbook-xsl, libbz2-dev, libcrypt-dev, libexpat1-dev, libncurses-dev, libreadline-dev, libtool, libxslt1-dev, libyaz-dev, pkgconf, tcl-dev, xsltproc, zlib1g-dev | libz-dev
Description: IDZebra IDZebra is a high-performance, general-purpose structured text indexing and retrieval engine. It reads structured records in a variety of input formats (e.g. email, XML, MARC) and allows access to them through exact boolean search expressions and relevance-ranked free-text queries.
Package-List: idzebra-2.0 deb text optional arch=any idzebra-2.0-common deb text optional arch=all idzebra-2.0-doc deb doc optional arch=all idzebra-2.0-examples deb text optional arch=all idzebra-2.0-utils deb text optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-0t64 deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-alvis deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-dom deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-grs-marc deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-grs-regx deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-grs-xml deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-safari deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-mod-text deb libs optional arch=any libidzebra-2.0-modules deb libs optional arch=any
